page.title: 17VILLAGE LIFE- IDE,1985.
page.content: Village life is a busy life,and many of the village activities are mentioned in our magazine{The Ide {Times}for example,The Jubilee Club,Gardening Club,& W.I.There is the 5th.(Ide)Scout Group,but no Guide Group.For young adults there is the pantomime group.There is only one school in the village which is a First School,taking children from 5-8 yrs.old,and a Toddlers group and Playgroup,which have a hut on the school grounds.There are 2 churches,a chapel & a Congregational church, both have a choir & sunday school, & there is bell ringing at the church. Amenities include a small village shop post office,& a greengrocers in West town.There is a small tea room & a restaurant.A fishman,butcher & library vans come weekly.The Parish council meet fortnightly to discuss problems.
